short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly view your LACRM contacts and tasks. Add new contacts in your browser from LinkedIn and GMail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the Blend Chrome Extension, you can continue to browse other sites, write emails, or even use tools like email marketing and LinkedIn, all while having your LACRM contacts easily accessible in your Chrome browser side panel.
 • Import new contacts directly from LinkedIn and Gmail.
 • Easily view recent contacts and upcoming tasks. 
 • Faster and easier to update and access your contacts
